cause.description:
I think we should invest all our government funds into bringing Steve McQueen back to life and using him to rule this country for ages. This is based soley on the fact that the "King of Cool" would be able to solve every problem we face easily.
1. Steve is alive within us
2. Dead people dont smell too bad
3. Slapping women
cause.mission: Bring him back from the dead!
cause.name: Bring back Steve McQueen
